name: Dice - 3D
description:
Realistic-looking dice in 3D!
With this app you will always have the right dice at your fingertips for the next game night!

The special thing about this dice app is that the dice fall realistically and in real time, thanks to the physics engine. They way you shake your iPhone or iPad affects the way the dice move.

To roll the dice, you can simply tap your touchscreen. To roll more dramatically, shake your iPhone or iPad and watch the dice tumble around realistically.

Alternatively, you can activate the "Bouncemode".
In the Bouncemode the dice will jump around. If you tap the green box, the dice fall to the ground. A further tap brings the dice to jump, again.

You can decide how many dice to play at the same time! Up to six dice can be played simultaneously.

- 1 to 6 dice (enough for each board game!)

- Convincing realtime 3D graphics and animation

- Real dice! Accurate rolling! The dice fall or roll realistically thanks to the complex physics engine.

- Sounds like real dice

- Universal app (runs on the iPhone, iPod touch and iPad)

- The sum of the dice are calculated and displayed automatically

- supports iPhone / iPad Retina Display

To use:
Tap the touchscreen or shake the iPhone/iPad to roll the dice.

In the Bouncemode the dice will jump around. If you tap the green box, the dice fall to the ground. A further tap brings the dice to jump, again.

The view is changed with a swipe of the finger. Use two fingers to zoom in or out.

The number of dice being played at the same time can be changed by tapping on the (+) and (-) buttons.
